scripts.text:
IF  NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables
WHERE name = N'Employee' AND type = 'U')

BEGIN
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Employee](
   ID INT,
   Name Varchar(100),
   Salary Int,
   Location Varchar(100),
   DEPT_NO INT
) 

END

IF  NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables
WHERE name = N'Department' AND type = 'U')

BEGIN
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Department](
   DEPT_NO INT,
   Name Varchar(100),
   MGR_NAME Varchar(100),
) 

END

TRUNCATE TABLE EMPLOYEE;
insert into Employee values(101,'aaaa', 100000, 'Hyderabad',10)
insert into Employee values(102,'bbbb', 100000, 'Bangalore',20)
insert into Employee values(103,'cccc', 100000, 'Chennai',30)
insert into Employee values(104,'dddd', 100000, 'Pune',40)
insert into Employee values(105,'eeee', 100000, 'Delhi',50)
select * from Employee e inner join Department d on e.DEPT_NO=d.DEPT_NO

SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE ='BASE TABLE'

PRINT 'TABLE LIST COLLECTED SUCESSFULLY'

derivedColumn2, derivedColumn3 join(unpivot2@{ Item} == unpivot1@{ Item}

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		StudentName as string,
		Location as string,
		Age as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> attendancefiles
source(output(
		StudentName as string,
		Location as string,
		Age as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
attendancefiles, source1 lookup(attendancefiles@StudentName == source1@StudentName,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		StudentName = attendancefiles@StudentName,
		Location = attendancefiles@Location,
		Age = attendancefiles@Age
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

sources.name: SourceDataset_o82
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceDataset_o82

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared SourceDataset_o82 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://rgdevstgacct.blob.core.windows.net/input/Employees.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = SourceDataset_o82
in
  Source;

source(output(
		StudentName as string,
		Location as string,
		Age as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		StudentName as string,
		Location as string,
		Age as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 aggregate(groupBy(StudentName),
	each(match(name!='StudentName'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
